Text: Won't work for me.. (unibody macbook pro) latest osx..

It didn't work for me either (not right away, anyway).
All you have to do is change the permissions on the Sparrow.app directory under the /Applications.
I did it like this:
cd /Applications
chmod -R 774 Sparrow.app

And that seems to fix it.
Working fine now...
Why is this 50megs? When the online org file is just under 10mb
